setProperty.name: depositAccountId
setProperty.datasonnet: local selector(obj,key,dValue = null) = ds.or(ds.select(obj,key), dValue); std.prune(selector(payload, "debtorAccountId", "0"))

setProperty.name: creditorAccountId
